body:
Comment 1: 
I'm not sure I see this situation spelled out in the language spec, so assigning to gri
for initial thoughts.

The error message is very weird. There's no expression taking the address of "ch", so
why is "&ch" coming up in the error?

It's not just the playground; I get the same error at tip locally.
_Labels changed: added **languagechange**, **compilerbug**._ _Owner changed to @griesemer._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
